sentences.sentence: Of your two wives, Dispassion and Worldliness.
sentences.translation: 你有两位妻子：清静和俗气；

sentences.sentence: And when one renounces the world one is caught in worldliness.
sentences.translation: 而当一个人摒弃了世界，他就困在了世俗里。

sentences.sentence: He was the embodiment of the Master's ideal of life in the world, unstained by worldliness.
sentences.translation: 他是师父理想生活在这个世界的表现，并没有受到俗气的污染。
